title: Alien Intrusion - Gary Bates
description:

About the author:
As a lifelong fan of sci-fi, Gary BatesÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ extensive background in marketing and communication have positioned him well to present in a fast-paced, gripping read the findings of his specialist research into UFO phenomenon and associated extraterrestrial beliefs.
